message.body: Update: all location locked!!!
Saturday: 28 W. 39th St Suite 401 NY, NY 10018
Sunday: 87 Lafayette St, New York, NY 10013
Hey what's the location for the car scene Saturday? And the call time is still 7am with skeleton crew correct?
I think we are searching. I believe it's gonna be around WSP
Yes skeleton crew.
It'll be me, you, Alex, the sound mixer
Brendan and Gina for cast

None of my messages are going through from my phone, so I’m trying the computer now--- but what is the 87 Laf location for the 19th? is that for storage, the dark room, or both? and is there a second location? i can’t find anything in the google doc.
Everything's on the shot list and google docs but
19th is the storage scene, Gao dark room, Garrison dark room and basement
I'll send you the extra list soon
Hey Jenna. Looks great!
Let's shift the call time to 9AM for Saturday
Because we need some time window for the exterior shoots before that
Extra wise: Natalynn Chun, Sara Kobayashi, David Sohn, Nick Giroux, Sophia Takashima, Gen Morigami
And two more from Backstage
And I'm getting little bit more
And since we have the space until 7. Could we get Michael and Stan in faster like 430ish?
Yep, I'll make the adjustments
Thanks again!
I'm just waiting to hear back from Amelia
Hey Jenna! Thanks for the call sheets! However, for Sunday we only have the location up to 7
Alright I'll correct it
Thanks
Wait. When's the earliest we get the Sunday location??
We only have 7 hits
Hours*
Alright well dinner will have to be just eating when people have free time... I don't know how else to swing this.
Yeah that might be best
We're extensively over prepping for Sunday
And we're gonna go with the studio system where art goes in and art and the. g and E light
While I'm in another room prepping actors
While we're shooting art and G&E prepares for the next scene
Great. I think that'll work really well.
